Generation V.Black: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.
Generation V.White: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
Generation V.Black 2: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
Generation V.White 2: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

Generation VI.X: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
Generation VI.Y: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: If both heads get angry simultaneously, this Pokémon expels a blizzard, burying everything in snow.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and, when angry, cause violent blizzards.

Generation VII.Sun: Each of its two heads has a brain, and when they are in agreement, it attacks its enemies by exhaling a violent blizzard.
Generation VII.Moon: Even if it loses one of its heads, it can live relatively problem-free. It makes snow clouds inside its body.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It blasts blizzards from its two mouths. It can create snow anywhere, so it gets a lot of love from skiers and snowboarders.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: Vanilluxe is born when two Vanillish, half-melted by the day's light, stick to each other and freeze together in the cold return of night.

Generation VIII.Sword: When its anger reaches a breaking point, this Pokémon unleashes a fierce blizzard that freezes every creature around it, be they friend or foe.
Generation VIII.Shield: People believe this Pokémon formed when two Vanillish stuck together. Its body temperature is roughly 21 degrees Fahrenheit .
